title: Cant login...still...
body: Havent been able to login for hours now...stuck on authentication screen everytime

replies.body:
If you're getting stuck on the authenticating process, it seems like something is stopping your network from reaching our login servers. Because you can't reliably talk with the servers to get verified, the client can't ever log you in. 

Check out the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure you're able to get a stable connection with our servers. Hit me back up if that doesn't seem to help!
